metadata.description: CNC Controller Alarm Database - Verified from manufacturer documentation

alarms.name: PLEASE TURN OFF POWER
alarms.description: Parameter or program was changed. Turn power off and back on to apply changes.

alarms.name: TH PARITY ALARM
alarms.description: Parity error detected in tape/program data during read. Data corruption in program.

alarms.name: TV PARITY ALARM
alarms.description: TV check alarm - character count in block is odd when should be even.
alarms.quick_fix: Edit program to correct block format

alarms.name: TOO MANY DIGITS
alarms.description: Numeric value in program exceeds maximum allowed digits.
alarms.quick_fix: Check and correct numeric values in program

alarms.name: ADDRESS NOT FOUND
alarms.description: First character of block is not an address letter (A-Z).
alarms.quick_fix: Add proper address letter to block start

alarms.name: NO DATA AFTER ADDRESS
alarms.description: Address letter found but no numeric data follows it.
alarms.quick_fix: Add numeric value after address letter

alarms.name: ILLEGAL USE OF NEGATIVE SIGN
alarms.description: Negative sign used where not allowed or incorrect position.
alarms.quick_fix: Check negative sign usage in program

alarms.name: ILLEGAL USE OF DECIMAL POINT
alarms.description: Decimal point used incorrectly or where not allowed.

alarms.name: IMPROPER G-CODE
alarms.description: G-code used is not valid or not available on this control.
alarms.quick_fix: Check G-code list for valid codes

alarms.name: NO FEEDRATE COMMANDED
alarms.description: Cutting move commanded without feedrate specified.
alarms.quick_fix: Add F (feedrate) command before cutting move

alarms.name: OVER TOLERANCE OF RADIUS
alarms.description: Arc start/end points don't match radius within tolerance.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify arc I, J, K values and endpoints

alarms.name: ILLEGAL PLANE AXIS COMMANDED
alarms.description: Invalid axis specified for the selected plane (G17/G18/G19).
alarms.quick_fix: Match plane selection to axis commands

alarms.name: NO CIRCLE RADIUS
alarms.description: Circular interpolation commanded without radius (R) or I,J,K.
alarms.quick_fix: Add R value or I,J,K to arc command

alarms.name: ILLEGAL OFFSET VALUE
alarms.description: Tool offset value outside allowable range.
alarms.quick_fix: Check offset values in offset table

alarms.name: ILLEGAL OFFSET NUMBER
alarms.description: Tool offset number specified doesn't exist or is invalid.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify offset number exists in table

alarms.name: NO SOLUTION AT CRC
alarms.description: Cutter radius compensation cannot calculate valid path.
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce tool radius or modify path geometry

alarms.name: INTERFERENCE IN CRC
alarms.description: Cutter compensation detects tool will gouge workpiece.
alarms.quick_fix: Use smaller tool or modify programmed path

alarms.name: PROGRAM NUMBER NOT FOUND
alarms.description: Called program number (O number) not found in memory.
alarms.quick_fix: Load program or correct program number

alarms.name: SEQUENCE NUMBER NOT FOUND
alarms.description: Sequence number (N number) specified in search not found.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify sequence number exists in program

alarms.name: NO PROGRAM SPACE IN MEMORY
alarms.description: Not enough memory to store program. Memory full.
alarms.quick_fix: Delete unused programs to free memory

alarms.name: DATA NOT FOUND
alarms.description: Specified data or address not found during search.

alarms.name: TOO MANY PROGRAMS
alarms.description: Maximum number of programs in memory exceeded.

alarms.name: PROGRAM NUMBER ALREADY IN
alarms.description: Attempting to register program number that already exists.
alarms.quick_fix: Use different program number or delete existing

alarms.name: ILLEGAL PROGRAM NUMBER
alarms.description: Program number format invalid or out of range.

alarms.name: COMMUNICATION ERROR
alarms.description: Error during RS-232 or network communication.

alarms.name: DR SIGNAL OFF
alarms.description: Data Ready signal not received during communication.
alarms.quick_fix: Check RS-232 cable and device power

alarms.name: REFERENCE RETURN INCOMPLETE
alarms.description: Reference point return (home) not completed on all axes.
alarms.quick_fix: Execute reference return on all axes

alarms.name: PARAMETER WRITE ENABLE
alarms.description: Parameter write protection is disabled. Parameters can be changed.
alarms.quick_fix: Turn off PWE after parameter changes

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS NEED ZRN
alarms.description: Absolute position data lost. Reference return required on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Perform reference point return on indicated axis

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS COMMUNICATION
alarms.description: Communication error with absolute encoder on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder cable connections and encoder

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS OVER TIME
alarms.description: Absolute position detector response timeout on axis n.

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS FRAMING
alarms.description: Framing error in absolute encoder data on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder cable shielding and routing

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS PARITY
alarms.description: Parity error in absolute encoder data on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder and replace if necessary

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS PULSE MISS
alarms.description: Pulse count error detected in absolute encoder on axis n.

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS BATTERY ZERO
alarms.description: Absolute encoder battery completely discharged on axis n.

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS BATTERY DOWN 1
alarms.description: Absolute encoder battery voltage low (warning level 1).

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS BATTERY DOWN 2
alarms.description: Absolute encoder battery voltage critically low (warning level 2).
alarms.quick_fix: Replace battery immediately before position loss

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS ZRN IMPOSSIBLE
alarms.description: Reference return cannot be completed on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check mechanical system, dogs, and switches

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Servo motor overload on axis n. Motor exceeded torque/current limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Check for mechanical binding, reduce load, check diagnosis 201

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS VRDY OFF
alarms.description: Servo amplifier ready signal (VRDY) turned off on axis n without CNC command.
alarms.quick_fix: Check servo amplifier status, power supply, E-stop circuit

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: SV CARD NOT EXIST
alarms.description: Servo control card/board not detected by CNC.
alarms.quick_fix: Check servo card installation and connections

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: CARD/SOFT MISMATCH
alarms.description: Servo card hardware and software versions incompatible.
alarms.quick_fix: Match servo card and software versions

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS VRDY ON
alarms.description: Servo ready signal ON when it should be OFF on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check servo amplifier and control signals

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: ZERO POINT RETURN FAULT
alarms.quick_fix: Check reference return dogs, switches, and parameters

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: EXCESS ERROR
alarms.description: Position error between command and feedback exceeds allowable tolerance.
alarms.quick_fix: Check mechanical system, servo parameters, motor and encoder

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n AXIS TORQUE ALM
alarms.description: Torque limit alarm triggered on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check for mechanical interference, reduce load

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS EXCESS ERROR
alarms.description: Excessive position error at stop position on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check mechanical system and servo tuning

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS EXCESS ERROR
alarms.description: Excessive position error during motion on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check mechanical system, adjust servo gains

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-th AXIS LSI OVERFLOW
alarms.description: Position data overflow in servo control LSI on axis n.

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS DETECTION RELATED ERROR
alarms.description: Feedback or detection system error on axis n. Check diagnosis 200.
alarms.quick_fix: Check diagnosis 200, inspect encoder and cables

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS EXCESS SHIFT
alarms.description: Excessive position shift detected on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder connections and cable shielding

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS DISCONNECTION
alarms.description: Servo motor or encoder disconnected on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check all motor and encoder cables and connectors

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS PARAMETER INCORRECT
alarms.description: Servo parameter setting incorrect for axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify and correct servo parameters for motor type

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n AXIS SYNC TORQUE
alarms.description: Synchronous axis torque deviation exceeded on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check tandem/synchronous axis setup and mechanics

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n AXIS EXCESS ER (D)
alarms.description: Excessive error during deceleration on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Adjust deceleration parameters, check mechanical system

alarms.name: n AXIS: SV MOTOR OVERHEAT
alarms.description: Servo motor overtemperature on axis n. Motor thermal protection triggered.
alarms.quick_fix: Allow motor to cool, check ventilation, reduce duty cycle

alarms.name: n AXIS: CNV. OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Converter unit overloaded on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check power supply capacity and regenerative load

alarms.name: n AXIS: CNV. LOW VOLT CONTROL
alarms.description: Converter control power voltage low on axis n.

alarms.name: n AXIS: CNV. LOW VOLT DC LINK
alarms.description: DC link voltage too low in converter on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check main power supply and converter

alarms.name: n AXIS: INV. LOW VOLT CONTROL
alarms.description: Inverter control voltage low on axis n.

alarms.name: n AXIS: INV. LOW VOLT DC LINK
alarms.description: Inverter DC link voltage low on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check power supply and regenerative resistor

alarms.name: n AXIS: SOFTTHERMAL (OVC)
alarms.description: Software thermal protection triggered (overcurrent) on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce load, allow cooling, check for mechanical issues

alarms.name: n AXIS: CNV. OVERCURRENT POWER
alarms.description: Overcurrent in converter power circuit on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check for short circuits in motor cables

alarms.name: n AXIS: INV. ABNORMAL CURRENT
alarms.description: Abnormal current detected in inverter on axis n.

alarms.name: n AXIS: CNV. OVER VOLT DC LINK
alarms.description: DC link overvoltage in converter on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check regenerative resistor and power supply

alarms.name: n AXIS: CNV. EX DECELERATION POW
alarms.description: Excessive deceleration power (regeneration) on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Adjust deceleration rate, check regen circuit

alarms.name: n AXIS: ABNORMAL CURRENT OFFSET
alarms.description: Current sensor offset error on axis n.

alarms.name: n AXIS: CNV. CHARGE FAILURE
alarms.description: DC link capacitor charge failure on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check charge circuit and DC link capacitors

alarms.name: n AXIS: CNV. COOLING FAN FAILURE
alarms.description: Converter cooling fan fault on axis n.

alarms.name: n AXIS: INV. COOLING FAN FAILURE
alarms.description: Inverter cooling fan fault on axis n.

alarms.name: n AXIS: SOFT DISCONNECT ALARM
alarms.description: Software detected motor disconnect on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check motor power cables and connectors

alarms.name: n AXIS: HARD DISCONNECT ALARM
alarms.description: Hardware detected motor disconnect on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Inspect and repair motor cable connections

alarms.name: n AXIS: HARD DISCONNECT (EXT)
alarms.description: External hardware disconnect detected on axis n.

alarms.name: n AXIS: UNMATCHED FEEDBACK ALARM
alarms.description: Feedback signal mismatch on axis n (dual feedback).
alarms.quick_fix: Check both feedback devices for matching signals

alarms.name: n AXIS: INV. IPM ALARM
alarms.description: Intelligent Power Module alarm in inverter on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check IPM module and motor connections

alarms.name: n AXIS: FSSB DISCONNECT
alarms.description: FSSB (high-speed serial bus) communication lost on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check FSSB fiber cables and amplifier

alarms.name: n AXIS: ILLEGAL AMP INTERFACE
alarms.description: Invalid amplifier interface detected on axis n.

alarms.name: n AXIS: SEND CNC DATA FAILED
alarms.description: Failed to send data from CNC to servo on axis n.

alarms.name: n AXIS: MOTOR/AMP COMBINATION
alarms.description: Motor and amplifier combination invalid on axis n.

alarms.name: OVER TRAVEL: +n
alarms.description: Positive direction software overtravel on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis back into range, check work offsets

alarms.name: OVER TRAVEL: -n
alarms.description: Negative direction software overtravel on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis back into range, check work offsets

alarms.name: OVER TRAVEL: +n
alarms.description: Positive direction hardware overtravel on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis off limit switch, check for damage

alarms.name: OVER TRAVEL: -n
alarms.description: Negative direction hardware overtravel on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis off limit switch, check for damage

alarms.name: OVER TRAVEL: +n
alarms.description: Positive stored stroke limit exceeded on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Modify program to stay within limits

alarms.name: OVER TRAVEL: -n
alarms.description: Negative stored stroke limit exceeded on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Modify program to stay within limits

alarms.name: OVERHEAT: CONTROL UNIT
alarms.description: CNC control unit temperature exceeded safe limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Check fans, clean filters, improve ventilation

alarms.name: OVERHEAT: FAN MOTOR
alarms.description: Cooling fan motor overheated or failed.

alarms.name: OVERHEAT: SPINDLE
alarms.description: Spindle motor temperature exceeded safe limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Allow spindle to cool, check cooling system

alarms.name: SPINDLE SERIAL LINK START FAULT
alarms.description: Failed to establish serial communication with spindle amplifier.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle communication cable and amplifier

alarms.name: FIRST SPINDLE ALARM DETECTION (AL-XX)
alarms.description: Alarm detected in first spindle amplifier. XX indicates specific alarm.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle amplifier LED display for specific fault

alarms.name: FIRST SPINDLE MODE CHANGE FAULT
alarms.description: First spindle failed to change mode (orientation, tapping, etc.).

alarms.name: SPINDLE-1 ABNORMAL TORQUE ALM
alarms.description: Abnormal torque detected on first spindle.
alarms.quick_fix: Check tool and workpiece, verify spindle operation

alarms.name: SECOND SPINDLE ALARM DETECTION (AL-XX)
alarms.description: Alarm detected in second spindle amplifier.
alarms.quick_fix: Check second spindle amplifier LED display

alarms.name: SECOND SPINDLE MODE CHANGE FAULT
alarms.description: Second spindle failed to change mode.
alarms.quick_fix: Check second spindle mechanics and amplifier

alarms.name: ROM PARITY
alarms.description: ROM parity error detected. System software corruption.
alarms.quick_fix: May require ROM replacement or system reload

alarms.name: SRAM PARITY: (BYTE 0)
alarms.description: SRAM parity error in byte 0. Memory corruption.
alarms.quick_fix: Check battery, may need memory board replacement

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM (1-4 AXIS)
alarms.description: General servo alarm on axes 1-4. Check specific axis.
alarms.quick_fix: Check individual axis alarms for details

alarms.name: CPU INTERRUPT
alarms.quick_fix: Power cycle, contact service if repeats

alarms.name: PMC SYSTEM ALARM
alarms.quick_fix: Check PMC ladder diagram, may need PMC reload

alarms.name: PMC WATCH DOG ALARM
alarms.description: PMC watchdog timer expired. PMC stopped responding.
alarms.quick_fix: Check PMC program for infinite loops

alarms.name: NON MASK INTERRUPT
alarms.description: Non-maskable interrupt occurred. Critical system fault.

alarms.name: COMM. FAILURE WITH MOCON/MOCON MEMORY FAULT
alarms.description: Communication failure between MOCON and main processor during self-test, or MOCON memory fault detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check cable connections, re-seat bus cables, check MOCON/processor status lights

alarms.name: SERVOS OFF
alarms.description: Servo motors are off, tool changer disabled, coolant off, spindle stopped. Normal at startup.
alarms.quick_fix: Press RESET to power servos on if no other fault exists

alarms.name: X SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: X-axis servo motor load exceeded parameter 9 maximum error. Position deviation too large.
alarms.quick_fix: Check X axis for mechanical binding, verify encoder, press RESET

alarms.name: Y SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: Y-axis servo motor load exceeded maximum error parameter. Position deviation too large.
alarms.quick_fix: Check Y axis for mechanical binding, verify encoder, press RESET

alarms.name: Z SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: Z-axis servo motor load exceeded maximum error parameter. Position deviation too large.
alarms.quick_fix: Check Z axis mechanics including counterbalance, press RESET

alarms.name: A SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: A-axis (rotary) servo motor load exceeded maximum error. Position deviation too large.
alarms.quick_fix: Check A axis rotary table mechanics, press RESET

alarms.name: EMERGENCY OFF
alarms.description: Emergency stop button pressed or E-stop circuit triggered.
alarms.quick_fix: Release E-stop button, check safety interlocks, press RESET

alarms.name: X SERVO OVERLOAD
alarms.description: X-axis servo motor current exceeded safe limits. Thermal protection may be active.
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce cutting load, check for binding, allow motor to cool

alarms.name: Y SERVO OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Y-axis servo motor current exceeded safe limits.
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce cutting load, check for binding, allow motor to cool

alarms.name: Z SERVO OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Z-axis servo motor current exceeded safe limits.
alarms.quick_fix: Check counterbalance, reduce load, allow motor to cool

alarms.name: A SERVO OVERLOAD
alarms.description: A-axis servo motor current exceeded safe limits.
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce load, check rotary table, allow motor to cool

alarms.name: NO INTERRUPT
alarms.description: System interrupt signal not received. Control board communication fault.
alarms.quick_fix: Power cycle, check board connections, contact service if persists

alarms.name: SHUTTLE IN FAULT (Mill) / TURRET UNLOCK FAULT (Lathe)
alarms.description: Mill: Tool shuttle failed to move to spindle. Lathe: Turret failed to unlock.
alarms.quick_fix: Check tool changer mechanism, verify sensors, check air/hydraulic pressure

alarms.name: SHUTTLE OUT FAULT (Mill) / TURRET LOCK FAULT (Lathe)
alarms.description: Mill: Tool shuttle failed to retract. Lathe: Turret failed to lock after index.
alarms.quick_fix: Check mechanism for obstruction, verify sensor operation

alarms.name: TURRET ROTATE FAULT
alarms.description: Tool turret/carousel failed to start rotating or failed to stop at correct position.
alarms.quick_fix: Check turret motor, verify position sensor, adjust parameters 62/63

alarms.name: SPINDLE ORIENTATION FAULT
alarms.description: Spindle failed to reach orientation position for tool change or tapping.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle orientation sensor and encoder, verify belt tension

alarms.name: SPINDLE HIGH GEAR FAULT
alarms.description: Spindle failed to shift to high gear range.
alarms.quick_fix: Check gear shift mechanism and solenoids

alarms.name: SPINDLE LOW GEAR FAULT
alarms.description: Spindle failed to shift to low gear range.
alarms.quick_fix: Check gear shift mechanism and solenoids

alarms.name: ATC FAULT
alarms.description: General automatic tool changer fault detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check ATC mechanism, verify tool positions, run ATC recovery

alarms.name: SPINDLE FAULT
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle drive display for specific error code

alarms.name: TOOL UNCLAMPED
alarms.description: Tool not properly clamped in spindle during operation.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify air pressure, check drawbar operation, reseat tool

alarms.name: TOOL NOT FOUND
alarms.description: Programmed tool number not found in tool magazine.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify tool is in magazine and tool table is correct

alarms.name: OVERTRAVEL +X
alarms.description: X-axis exceeded positive software travel limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis back into range, check work offsets and program

alarms.name: OVERTRAVEL -X
alarms.description: X-axis exceeded negative software travel limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis back into range, check work offsets and program

alarms.name: OVERTRAVEL +Y
alarms.description: Y-axis exceeded positive software travel limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis back into range, check work offsets and program

alarms.name: OVERTRAVEL -Y
alarms.description: Y-axis exceeded negative software travel limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis back into range, check work offsets and program

alarms.name: OVERTRAVEL +Z
alarms.description: Z-axis exceeded positive software travel limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis back into range, check tool length offsets

alarms.name: OVERTRAVEL -Z
alarms.description: Z-axis exceeded negative software travel limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis back into range, check tool length offsets

alarms.name: SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: General servo following error exceeded tolerance on any axis.
alarms.quick_fix: Check which axis has error, inspect mechanical system

alarms.name: X AXIS DRIVE FAULT
alarms.description: X-axis servo drive amplifier fault detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check drive status LEDs, allow cooling, check power

alarms.name: Y AXIS DRIVE FAULT
alarms.description: Y-axis servo drive amplifier fault detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check drive status LEDs, allow cooling, check power

alarms.name: Z AXIS DRIVE FAULT
alarms.description: Z-axis servo drive amplifier fault detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check drive status LEDs, allow cooling, check power

alarms.name: A AXIS DRIVE FAULT
alarms.description: A-axis servo drive amplifier fault detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check drive status LEDs, allow cooling, check power

alarms.name: SPINDLE DIRECTION FAULT
alarms.description: Problem with rigid tapping hardware. Spindle direction feedback error.
alarms.quick_fix: Check rigid tapping hardware and spindle encoder

alarms.name: APC-PALLET CLAMP TIMEOUT
alarms.description: Pallet in mill did not clamp within allowed time.
alarms.quick_fix: Check for obstructions, verify air pressure, check solenoids

alarms.name: MACRO NOT COMPLETED - SPINDLE DISABLED
alarms.description: Macro code for optional equipment not completed due to E-stop, reset, or power down.
alarms.quick_fix: Check optional equipment status, restart macro

alarms.name: SPINDLE NOT TURNING
alarms.description: Spindle not turning when commanded. Check for G99 feed per revolution mode.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle drive, verify belt, check G98/G99 mode

alarms.name: B SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: B-axis servo motor position error exceeded Parameter 159.
alarms.quick_fix: Check B axis mechanics, motor, and encoder

alarms.name: MISC. SOFTWARE ERROR
alarms.description: Miscellaneous software error detected in control.
alarms.quick_fix: Power cycle machine, contact Haas if persists

alarms.name: VD OVER TEMP
alarms.description: Vector drive (spindle drive) temperature exceeded safe limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Allow drive to cool, check cooling fans, reduce spindle load

alarms.name: SPINDLE OVERHEAT
alarms.description: Spindle motor or bearing temperature exceeded safe limits.
alarms.quick_fix: Stop spindle, allow cooling, check bearings if persists

alarms.name: NO. OF PROGRAMS CHANGED
alarms.description: Number of programs in memory has changed since last edit.
alarms.quick_fix: Informational only, verify program list is correct

alarms.name: SPINDLE DRIVE FAULT
alarms.description: Fault detected in spindle drive system.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle drive status display for specific fault code

alarms.name: TOOL CHANGE FAULT
alarms.description: Mechanical issue detected during tool change operation.
alarms.quick_fix: Check ATC mechanism for obstructions, verify all sensors

alarms.name: EXPRSN. NOT ALLOWED WITH N OR O
alarms.description: Expression not allowed with N (sequence) or O (program) addresses.
alarms.quick_fix: Edit program to correct macro syntax

alarms.name: ILLEGAL ASSIGNMENT VAR OR VALUE
alarms.description: Illegal variable assignment or value in macro.

alarms.name: CONDITIONAL REQUIRED PRIOR TO THEN
alarms.description: IF statement missing before THEN in macro.
alarms.quick_fix: Add IF conditional before THEN statement

alarms.name: VAR. REF. ILLEGAL DURING MOVEMENT
alarms.description: Variable reference not allowed during axis motion.
causes: Trying to read variable during move
alarms.quick_fix: Read variable before or after motion block

alarms.name: COMM. FAILURE WITH MOCON2
alarms.description: Communication failure with secondary MOCON board.
alarms.quick_fix: Check cable connections to MOCON2 board

alarms.name: NEGATIVE R AND C VALUES NOT ALLOWED
alarms.description: Negative values for R (radius) or C (chamfer) not permitted.
alarms.quick_fix: Use positive values for R and C

alarms.name: LOW BATTERY
alarms.description: Control backup battery voltage is low. Risk of memory/parameter loss.

alarms.name: SRAM CLEAR FORCED AT NEXT POWER ON
alarms.description: Service switch position forces SRAM clear (general reset) at next power on.
alarms.quick_fix: Move service switch to normal position before power on

alarms.name: HARDWARE MODULE FOR DIGITIZER MISSING
alarms.description: Hardware plug-in module required for digitizer communication is not installed.

alarms.name: SRAM BACKUP USED
alarms.description: SRAM backup copy was used to restore data. Backup time may have been exceeded.
alarms.quick_fix: Check battery, verify operating time specifications

alarms.name: FINE CORRECTION AMOUNT TOO LARGE
alarms.description: Fine correction in parameter of orientable toolholder exceeds allowable limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce fine correction value in toolholder parameter

alarms.name: ORIENTABLE TOOLHOLDER DOES NOT EXIST
alarms.description: Referenced orientable toolholder number for orientation transformation does not exist.
alarms.quick_fix: Configure toolholder or correct reference number

alarms.name: INVALID TRANSFORMATION TYPE
alarms.description: Invalid transformation type specified in transformation number.

alarms.name: MACHINE DATA ERROR
alarms.description: Error in machine data configuration. MD conflict detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check and correct specified machine data

alarms.name: NC USER CODE CONFIGURATION ERROR
alarms.description: NC code/keyword reconfiguration error in MD 10712.

alarms.name: AXIS n NOT AVAILABLE
alarms.description: Programmed axis is not configured or not available.
alarms.quick_fix: Check axis configuration in machine data

alarms.name: AXIS MOVEMENT NOT POSSIBLE
alarms.description: Commanded axis movement cannot be executed.
alarms.quick_fix: Check axis interlocks and safety functions

alarms.name: AXIS n HARDWARE LIMIT SWITCH PLUS
alarms.description: Hardware limit switch triggered in positive direction on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis off limit switch, check for damage

alarms.name: AXIS n HARDWARE LIMIT SWITCH MINUS
alarms.description: Hardware limit switch triggered in negative direction on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis off limit switch, check for damage

alarms.name: AXIS n SOFTWARE LIMIT SWITCH PLUS
alarms.description: Software limit exceeded in positive direction on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Modify program or work offset to stay within limits

alarms.name: AXIS n SOFTWARE LIMIT SWITCH MINUS
alarms.description: Software limit exceeded in negative direction on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Modify program or work offset to stay within limits

alarms.name: HARDWARE FAULT ACTIVE ENCODER
alarms.description: Hardware fault detected in active encoder on drive.

alarms.name: ENCODER FAULT - SIGNAL AMPLITUDE
alarms.description: Encoder signal amplitude outside valid range.
alarms.quick_fix: Clean encoder, check cable, replace if necessary

alarms.name: ENCODER FAULT - AB TRACK
alarms.description: Error in encoder AB track signals.
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder signals, clean or replace encoder

alarms.name: DRIVE FAULT - OVERVOLTAGE
alarms.description: DC link overvoltage in servo drive.

alarms.name: DRIVE FAULT - UNDERVOLTAGE
alarms.description: DC link undervoltage in servo drive.

alarms.name: POWER MODULE OVERTEMPERATURE
alarms.description: Power module temperature exceeded safe limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Check cooling fan operation, reduce load

alarms.name: MOTOR OVERTEMPERATURE
alarms.quick_fix: Allow motor to cool, check motor and cooling

alarms.name: LINE SUPPLY UNDERVOLTAGE
alarms.description: Main line supply voltage below minimum.

alarms.name: LINE SUPPLY OVERVOLTAGE
alarms.description: Main line supply voltage above maximum.

alarms.name: DRIVE-CLiQ COMPONENT NOT READY
alarms.description: DRIVE-CLiQ component did not become ready in time.
alarms.quick_fix: Power off/on all components, check sequence

alarms.name: TOOL NOT AVAILABLE
alarms.description: Programmed tool not found in tool management.
alarms.quick_fix: Load tool into magazine or correct T number

alarms.name: TOOL WORN - LIFE EXPIRED
alarms.description: Tool life monitoring indicates tool is worn.
alarms.quick_fix: Replace tool and reset tool life counter

alarms.name: PLC USER ALARM - BASE
alarms.description: PLC user alarm starting address (DB2.DBX180.0). Specific meaning depends on machine.
alarms.quick_fix: Check machine documentation for specific PLC alarm meaning

alarms.name: SAFE STOP 1 ACTIVE
alarms.description: Safe Stop 1 (SS1) safety function active. Controlled stop followed by STO.

alarms.name: SAFE STOP 2 ACTIVE
alarms.description: Safe Stop 2 (SS2) safety function active. Controlled stop, drive stays enabled.

alarms.name: SAFE TORQUE OFF
alarms.description: Safe Torque Off (STO) function active. Motor power disabled.

alarms.name: SYSTEM HARDWARE ERROR
alarms.description: Hardware trouble detected in CNC system.

alarms.name: SERVO ABNORMAL (POWER-OFF LEVEL)
alarms.description: Servo amplifier fault requiring power off.

alarms.name: SERVO PARAMETER ERROR
alarms.description: Parameters transferred from NC to servo amplifier during power-on are incorrect.

alarms.name: SERVO ABNORMAL (NC RESET LEVEL)
alarms.description: Servo fault at NC reset level.

alarms.name: SPINDLE ABNORMAL (POWER-OFF LEVEL)
alarms.description: Spindle amplifier fault requiring power off.

alarms.name: SPINDLE PARAMETER ERROR
alarms.description: Spindle parameters transferred during power-on are incorrect.

alarms.name: SPINDLE ABNORMAL (NC RESET LEVEL)
alarms.description: Spindle fault at NC reset level.

alarms.name: SPINDLE SAFETY SPEED ERROR
alarms.description: Spindle trouble in safety-speed operation mode.
alarms.quick_fix: Contact Mazak with alarm number details

alarms.name: MR-JT-C2 COMMUNICATION ERROR
alarms.description: Communication trouble with MR-JT-C2. E2ROM write failure.

alarms.name: BATTERY LOW
alarms.description: NC battery reached minimum voltage for retaining parameters and programs.

alarms.name: S-RAM ABNORMAL
alarms.description: S-RAM on CPU card has become abnormal.

alarms.name: RAM ABNORMAL
alarms.description: RAM on CPU card has become abnormal.

alarms.name: ABSOLUTE POSITION LOST
alarms.description: Absolute position detection system lost absolute position data.

alarms.name: ABSOLUTE POSITION MISMATCH
alarms.description: Cross-check error between detector absolute position and NC internal coordinate data.

alarms.name: OPERATION ERROR
alarms.description: Operation mistake during automatic operation caused tool to overstep software limits.

alarms.name: MODE SELECT ERROR
alarms.description: Incorrect mode selection or mode selector switch malfunction.

alarms.name: CUTTING FEED OVERRIDE ZERO
alarms.description: Cutting-feed override value is set to 0 on operating panel.
alarms.quick_fix: Set cutting-feed override to value greater than 0

alarms.name: MANUAL FEEDRATE ZERO
alarms.description: Manual feedrate set to 0 during automatic operation dry-run.
alarms.quick_fix: Set manual feedrate to value greater than 0

alarms.name: SPINDLE ROTATION ERROR
alarms.description: Spindle did not start rotating when commanded during automatic operation.

alarms.name: SPINDLE SPEED LIMIT EXCEEDED
alarms.description: Spindle speed limit has been exceeded.

alarms.name: INTERLOCK BLOCK START
alarms.description: Interlock signal to lock start of program block has been input.
alarms.quick_fix: Check sequence program for interlock condition

alarms.name: INTERLOCK CUTTING BLOCK
alarms.description: Interlock signal to lock start of cutting program block has been input.
alarms.quick_fix: Check sequence program for interlock condition

alarms.name: DYNAMIC COMPENSATION OVERFLOW
causes: Workpiece origin too far from table center
alarms.quick_fix: Center workpiece coordinate zero in workpiece

alarms.name: HYDRAULIC UNIT PRESSURE DOWN
alarms.description: Low hydraulic pressure state has continued.
alarms.quick_fix: Check hydraulic system pressure, pump, and fluid level

alarms.name: AIR PRESSURE DOWN
alarms.quick_fix: Check air supply and pressure regulator

alarms.name: SPINDLE OIL PRESSURE DOWN
alarms.description: Spindle lubrication oil pressure is low.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle oil pump and level

alarms.name: SPINDLE OIL LOW
alarms.description: Spindle lubrication oil level is low.

alarms.name: SPINDLE CHILLER MALFUNCTION
alarms.quick_fix: Check chiller operation and coolant level

alarms.name: IRREGULAR SLIDEWAY OIL PRESSURE
alarms.description: Slideway lubrication oil pressure is irregular.

alarms.name: SLIDEWAY OIL LOW
alarms.description: Slideway lubrication oil level is low.

alarms.name: SPINDLE CONTROLLER MALFUNCTION
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle drive for specific fault code

alarms.name: MAGAZINE DRUM MALFUNCTION
alarms.quick_fix: Check magazine motor and position sensors

alarms.name: ILLEGAL TOOL DESIGNATED
alarms.description: Invalid tool number designated for tool change.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify tool number exists in magazine

alarms.name: THERMAL TRIP
alarms.description: Thermal protection triggered on motor or drive.
alarms.quick_fix: Allow cooling, check for overload condition

alarms.name: CONVEYOR THERMAL TRIP
alarms.description: Chip conveyor motor thermal protection triggered.
alarms.quick_fix: Clear chip buildup, allow motor to cool

alarms.name: MAIN TRANSFORMER OVERHEAT
alarms.description: Main power transformer temperature exceeded safe limit.

alarms.name: AFC OVERLOAD
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce cutting parameters, check tool condition

alarms.name: TOOL MEASUREMENT UNIT NOT IN POSITION
alarms.description: Tool measurement unit not in expected position.
alarms.quick_fix: Check tool setter position and sensors

alarms.name: INPUT DATA FORMAT ERROR
alarms.description: Format of input data is not valid.

alarms.name: PROGRAM LOCK ENABLED
alarms.description: Operation cannot be performed - program lock enabled.
alarms.quick_fix: Set PROGRAM LOCK/ENABLE switch to ENABLE

alarms.name: TOOL IN SPINDLE
alarms.description: Operation cannot be performed while tool is in spindle.

alarms.name: DATA NOT FOUND
alarms.description: Designated number or character string does not exist in program.
alarms.quick_fix: Designate an existent number or string

alarms.name: MEMORY DATA DESTROYED
alarms.description: Memory contents in machining program storage area have been destroyed.

alarms.name: INTERFERENCE DETECTED
alarms.description: Interference between moving groups detected. Collision prevention active.
alarms.quick_fix: Modify program to avoid interference zone

alarms.name: PLEASE TURN OFF POWER
alarms.description: Parameter change requires power cycle to take effect
causes: Parameter requiring power cycle was modified
alarms.quick_fix: Turn off power, wait 10 seconds, turn back on

alarms.name: TH PARITY ALARM
alarms.description: Tape reader parity error detected in data transmission

alarms.name: TV PARITY ALARM
alarms.description: TV check error in program block - odd number of characters

alarms.name: TOO MANY DIGITS
alarms.description: Excessive digits specified in numeric data word
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce number of digits in data word

alarms.name: ADDRESS NOT FOUND
alarms.description: Block missing required address letter (X, Y, Z, etc.)
alarms.quick_fix: Add missing address letter to block

alarms.name: NO DATA AFTER ADDRESS
alarms.description: Missing numeric value after address letter

alarms.name: ILLEGAL USE OF NEGATIVE SIGN
alarms.description: Negative sign used where not permitted
causes: Negative value in address that only accepts positive

alarms.name: ILLEGAL USE OF DECIMAL POINT
alarms.description: Decimal point used where not allowed
alarms.quick_fix: Remove decimal point or use integer value

alarms.name: ILLEGAL ADDRESS INPUT
alarms.description: Invalid address character used in block

alarms.name: IMPROPER G-CODE
alarms.description: G-code not supported or used incorrectly
causes: G-code not available on this control
alarms.quick_fix: Check G-code validity for control type

alarms.name: NO FEEDRATE COMMANDED
alarms.description: Feed move attempted without F-code feedrate
causes: Missing F word in cutting move
alarms.quick_fix: Add valid feedrate (F word) to block

alarms.name: TOO MANY AXES COMMANDED
alarms.description: More axes specified than can move simultaneously

alarms.name: OVER TOLERANCE OF RADIUS
alarms.description: Arc endpoint does not match calculated radius within tolerance
alarms.quick_fix: Recalculate arc I/J/K or R values

alarms.name: ILLEGAL PLANE AXIS COMMANDED
alarms.description: Invalid axis specified for current plane selection

alarms.name: NO CIRCLE RADIUS
alarms.quick_fix: Add I/J/K or R to arc command

alarms.name: ILLEGAL PLANE SELECT
alarms.description: Invalid plane selection for this operation
causes: Plane not valid for command type

alarms.name: ILLEGAL OFFSET VALUE
alarms.description: Tool offset value out of valid range

alarms.name: ILLEGAL OFFSET NUMBER
alarms.description: Tool offset number does not exist

alarms.name: NO SOLUTION AT CRC
alarms.description: Cutter radius compensation cannot find valid intersection
causes: Tool too large for programmed path
alarms.quick_fix: Adjust path or use smaller tool compensation

alarms.name: INTERFERENCE IN CRC
alarms.description: Cutter compensation would cause tool to gouge workpiece

alarms.name: PROGRAM NUMBER NOT FOUND
alarms.description: Called program number does not exist in memory

alarms.name: SEQUENCE NUMBER NOT FOUND
alarms.description: Referenced N number not found in program

alarms.name: NO PROGRAM SPACE IN MEMORY
alarms.quick_fix: Delete unused programs to free memory

alarms.name: DATA NOT FOUND
alarms.description: Required data not found during search or edit

alarms.name: TOO MANY PROGRAMS
alarms.description: Maximum number of stored programs exceeded

alarms.name: PROGRAM NUMBER ALREADY IN USE
alarms.description: Attempting to create program with existing number
alarms.quick_fix: Use different program number or delete existing

alarms.name: COMMUNICATION ERROR
alarms.description: Serial communication failure during data transfer

alarms.name: REFERENCE RETURN INCOMPLETE
alarms.description: Machine has not completed reference point return

alarms.name: PARAMETER WRITE ENABLE
alarms.quick_fix: Turn off write enable after changes

alarms.name: APC ALARM: AXIS NEED ZRN
alarms.description: Absolute position lost - axis requires reference return
alarms.quick_fix: Perform reference point return on affected axis

alarms.name: APC ALARM: BATTERY ZERO
alarms.description: Absolute encoder backup battery completely depleted
alarms.quick_fix: Replace battery immediately, then re-home all axes

alarms.name: APC ALARM: BATTERY DOWN 1
alarms.description: Absolute encoder battery voltage low - warning level 1
alarms.quick_fix: Replace battery soon to prevent position loss

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Servo motor overloaded - excessive current draw
alarms.quick_fix: Check for mechanical binding, reduce load

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: VRDY OFF
alarms.description: Servo amplifier not ready - drive ready signal lost

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: SV CARD NOT EXIST
SERVO ALARM: VRDY ON
alarms.description: Servo ready signal ON when should be OFF

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: EXCESS ERROR
alarms.description: Position error exceeds tolerance during motion
alarms.quick_fix: Check mechanical system, verify servo parameters

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: TORQUE ALM
alarms.description: Torque limit exceeded on servo motor
alarms.quick_fix: Check for obstructions, reduce cutting parameters

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: EXCESS ERROR
alarms.description: Excessive error at stop (position not held)

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: LSI OVERFLOW
alarms.description: Position data overflow in servo LSI

alarms.name: SV MOTOR OVERHEAT
alarms.description: Servo motor temperature exceeded safe limit

alarms.name: CNV OVERLOAD
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce deceleration rate, check braking resistor

alarms.name: CNV OVER VOLT DC LINK
alarms.description: DC link voltage too high in converter

alarms.name: FSSB DISCONNECT
alarms.description: FSSB (FANUC Serial Servo Bus) communication lost

alarms.name: OVER TRAVEL: +n
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis away from limit in opposite direction

alarms.name: OVER TRAVEL: -n
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis away from limit in opposite direction

alarms.name: OVER TRAVEL: +n (SOFT)
causes: Program commanded position beyond soft limit
alarms.quick_fix: Check program coordinates, adjust soft limits if needed

alarms.name: OVER TRAVEL: -n (SOFT)
causes: Program commanded position beyond soft limit
alarms.quick_fix: Check program coordinates, adjust soft limits if needed

alarms.name: OVERHEAT: FAN MOTOR
alarms.description: Cooling fan motor overheated or failed

alarms.name: OVERHEAT: SPINDLE
alarms.quick_fix: Stop spindle, check coolant, allow cooling

alarms.name: SPINDLE SERIAL LINK START FAULT
alarms.description: Spindle serial communication failed at startup

alarms.name: SPINDLE ALARM DETECTION (AL-XX)
alarms.description: Spindle amplifier fault detected - see sub-code
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle amp LED code for specific fault

alarms.name: SPINDLE MODE CHANGE FAULT
alarms.description: Spindle failed to change between modes
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle is at correct speed for mode change

alarms.name: ROM PARITY
alarms.description: ROM parity error - firmware corruption detected
alarms.quick_fix: Contact service - may need ROM replacement

alarms.name: SRAM PARITY: (BYTE 0)
alarms.quick_fix: Check battery, may need memory replacement

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM (1-4 AXIS)
alarms.description: General servo system alarm on axes 1-4

alarms.name: CPU INTERRUPT
alarms.quick_fix: Power cycle, contact service if persists

alarms.name: PMC WATCH DOG ALARM
alarms.description: PMC watchdog timer expired - PMC stopped responding

alarms.name: NC NOT READY
alarms.description: NC system is not ready - initialization incomplete
alarms.quick_fix: Wait for initialization, check system errors

alarms.name: AXIS NOT READY
alarms.description: Axis servo not enabled or ready

alarms.name: SPINDLE NOT READY
alarms.description: Spindle drive not ready for operation

alarms.name: BATTERY ALARM
alarms.description: Backup battery voltage low - data loss risk

alarms.name: BATTERY FAILURE
alarms.description: Backup battery completely depleted - data may be lost

alarms.name: SRAM CLEAR ACTIVE
alarms.description: Service switch forcing SRAM clear on next power-on
alarms.quick_fix: Check service switch, reload data after reset

alarms.name: NC START INHIBITED
alarms.description: NC start prevented by safety or other condition

alarms.name: REFERENCE POINT NOT REACHED
alarms.description: Axis has not completed reference point approach

alarms.name: DIVIDE BY ZERO
alarms.description: Division by zero in program calculation

alarms.name: ROOT OF NEGATIVE NUMBER
alarms.description: Square root of negative number attempted

alarms.name: LOG OF ZERO OR NEGATIVE
alarms.description: Logarithm of zero or negative number

alarms.name: TOOL NOT AVAILABLE
alarms.description: Programmed tool not defined in tool management
alarms.quick_fix: Load tool or correct T number

alarms.name: CONTOUR VIOLATION
alarms.description: Programmed path would violate contour limits

alarms.name: SPINDLE ORIENTATION FAILED
alarms.description: Spindle failed to orient within time limit

alarms.name: SINAMICS FIRMWARE MISMATCH
alarms.description: Drive firmware incompatible with NC software

alarms.name: MOTOR OVERTEMP
alarms.quick_fix: Allow motor to cool, check cooling

alarms.name: FIRMWARE UPDATE RUNNING
alarms.description: DRIVE-CLiQ component firmware update in progress

alarms.name: COMM. FAILURE WITH MOCON
alarms.description: Communication failure with motion control board

alarms.name: SERVO OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Servo motor overloaded - excessive current for extended time
alarms.quick_fix: Check for mechanical binding, reduce load

alarms.name: X SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: X axis following error exceeded limit
alarms.quick_fix: Check X axis ballscrew, encoder, servo parameters

alarms.name: Y SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: Y axis following error exceeded limit
alarms.quick_fix: Check Y axis ballscrew, encoder, servo parameters

alarms.name: Z SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: Z axis following error exceeded limit
alarms.quick_fix: Check Z axis ballscrew, encoder, counterbalance

alarms.name: A SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: A axis following error exceeded limit
alarms.quick_fix: Check A axis mechanics and encoder

alarms.name: TOOL IN SPINDLE
alarms.description: Tool detected in spindle when not expected

alarms.name: SPINDLE ORIENT TIMEOUT
alarms.description: Spindle failed to orient within time limit

alarms.name: SHUTTLE IN FAULT
alarms.description: Tool shuttle failed to reach IN position

alarms.name: SHUTTLE OUT FAULT
alarms.description: Tool shuttle failed to reach OUT position

alarms.name: ATC MAGAZINE FAULT
alarms.description: Tool magazine failed to index properly

alarms.name: TOOL UNCLAMP FAULT
alarms.description: Tool failed to unclamp from spindle

alarms.name: TOOL CLAMP FAULT
alarms.description: Tool failed to clamp in spindle

alarms.name: SPINDLE NOT AT SPEED
alarms.description: Spindle failed to reach commanded speed

alarms.name: SPINDLE DRIVE FAULT
alarms.quick_fix: Check drive error code, cycle power

alarms.name: X PLUS OVERTRAVEL
alarms.description: X axis positive overtravel limit hit

alarms.name: X MINUS OVERTRAVEL
alarms.description: X axis negative overtravel limit hit

alarms.name: Y PLUS OVERTRAVEL
alarms.description: Y axis positive overtravel limit hit

alarms.name: Y MINUS OVERTRAVEL
alarms.description: Y axis negative overtravel limit hit

alarms.name: Z PLUS OVERTRAVEL
alarms.description: Z axis positive overtravel limit hit

alarms.name: Z MINUS OVERTRAVEL
alarms.description: Z axis negative overtravel limit hit

alarms.name: MACRO NOT COMPLETED
alarms.description: Macro code not completed - spindle disabled

alarms.name: SPINDLE NOT TURNING
alarms.description: Spindle is not turning when commanded (G99 mode)
alarms.quick_fix: Start spindle, check G99 feed per rev mode

alarms.name: VD OVER TEMP
alarms.quick_fix: Check drive cooling fan, allow cooldown

alarms.name: LOW AIR PRESSURE
alarms.description: Shop air pressure below minimum (80 PSI)

alarms.name: CHIP CONVEYOR FAULT
alarms.description: Chip conveyor motor overload or fault

alarms.name: DOOR HOLD
alarms.description: Door open during operation requiring closed door

alarms.name: LOW HYDRAULIC PRESSURE
alarms.quick_fix: Check hydraulic fluid level and pump

alarms.name: INVALID X, Y OR Z IN G02 OR G03
alarms.description: Arc endpoint does not match arc center and radius

alarms.name: INVALID R VALUE
alarms.description: Arc R value invalid for programmed endpoints
alarms.quick_fix: Verify R value can reach endpoint

alarms.name: TOO MANY DECIMAL PLACES
alarms.description: Number has more decimal places than supported

alarms.name: INVALID OFFSET NUMBER
alarms.description: Work offset or tool offset number invalid

alarms.name: INVALID G-CODE
alarms.description: G-code not recognized or not available
alarms.quick_fix: Check G-code is valid for HAAS

alarms.name: CUTTER COMP INTERFERENCE
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce cutter comp or adjust path

alarms.name: NO SOLUTION FOR CUTTER COMP
alarms.quick_fix: Simplify geometry or reduce comp value

alarms.name: PROGRAM NOT FOUND
alarms.description: Called program number not in memory

alarms.name: EXPRESSION NOT ALLOWED WITH N OR O
alarms.description: Expression not allowed with N or O address
alarms.quick_fix: Remove expression from N or O line

alarms.name: VAR REF ILLEGAL DURING MOVEMENT
alarms.description: Variable reference not allowed during motion
alarms.quick_fix: Read variable before or after motion

alarms.name: COMM FAILURE WITH MOCON2
alarms.description: Communication failure with second motion board

alarms.name: NEGATIVE R AND C VALUES NOT ALLOWED
alarms.description: Negative R or C value not permitted

alarms.name: LOW BATTERY
alarms.quick_fix: Replace battery to prevent data loss
